00012 WorldState* loadScenario1()

00014         WorldState* state = new WorldState();
00015 
00016         GameObject* background = new GameObject();
00017         background->usesPhysics = false;
00018         background->setSprite("Backgrounds\\background");
00019         state->addBackgroundObject(background);
00020 
00021         Ship* player = new Ship();

00024         player->projectileBrain = &makeBoringBrain;

00026         
00027         const int offset = 50;
00028         for (int i = 0 ; i<1 ; i++)
00029         {
00030                 Ship* opponent = new Ship();
00031                 opponent->displayHeading.set_degrees(180);
00032                 opponent->setSprite("Hulls\\drone");
00033                 //opponent->brain->addChild(new AbsoluteMovement(DOWN,5));
00034                 opponent->projectileBrain = makeBoringBrain;
00035                 opponent->brain
00036                         ->addChild((new RepeatNode(-1))
00037                                 ->addChild((new SequentialNode())
00038                                         ->addChild(new BoolCondition<GameObject>(&GameObject::alignedWithPlayer,true))
00039                                         ->addChild(new Fire())
00040                                         ->addChild(new Cooldown(500))))
00041                         ->addChild(new TurnTowardsTarget(.5));
00042                 state->insertObject(opponent,point(50 + i * offset,100));
00043         }
00044         return state;
00045 }}
